website_summaries.verdict: Say goodbye to acne blemishes when you treat your skin to this effective and healing mask. Helps restore a clear, healthy complexion. Box of 5 masks.
pros: Antioxidant glutathione, along with tea tree oil, salicylic acid, and niacinamide heal skin inflammation and blemishes without overly drying your skin
The sheet is silky-soft and comfortable to wear
cons: If your skin is dry or very sensitive, this mask might be irritating

customer_reviews.title: Not fake!
customer_reviews.text: Bought several boxes and thought it might be fake.... however I purchased two from Sephora and compared them to the ones I got from Amazon. The writing on the packages are different. There is French? On the Amazon sheet masks along with English and Korean. I compared the sheet mask texture... smell... down to the tee. The only difference is the outside packaging... the inside is completely the same. After using both masks, I also see no difference between the two. They are both equally as effective.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: This is a fake product. I have been using ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake product. I have been using this brand and this specific red mask for a long time. The mask sheet is so thin and there is no elasticity at all. The real one uses a smooth and kinda-of thick mask sheet and with very rich essence. The first sec I open the paper bag, I can tell this is a fake product...
customer_reviews.author: Jiahong

customer_reviews.title: My skin was terrible after using the product
customer_reviews.text: My skin was terrible after using the product. I broke out all over - I was hoping it was just my skin purging from the salicylic acid, but after reading the reviews of this being a fake product I am really concerned. I am going to throw out to the remainder of the masks. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Mangini

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Mask
customer_reviews.text: There aren't many products I'll buy a second time but I'm now on my fourth box! I'm 24 and unfortunately still prone to breakouts and dealing with some leftover red acne marks, but I've honestly seen a huge difference in my skin: less acne plus marks that have been on my skin for over a year are finally starting to fade. I rarely go a week without some kind of pimple popping up in my face, but it's been well over a month since I've had any acne! Of course I'm using other things on my skin (Mario Badescu Vitamin C Serum and Philosophy Microdelivery Wash which are amazing) but this now a must-have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really does feel good on your face
customer_reviews.text: It really does feel good on your face! But I don't think it helps with acne much. I just think it works good as moisturizing and I think its mostly a regular face mask. Maybe I needed to use the mask with cleanser, toner and moisturizing cream. Otherwise I really like the mask I just think its like a regular mask, not really for acne.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clears your skin of blemishes
customer_reviews.text: These masks are wonderful and provides spa level mask effects

customer_reviews.title: great for super sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Pros: great for super sensitive skin. Reduces redness and leaves face looking brighter Cons: the facemask is a fit-most. The eye and nose cut out don't quite align with mine but is still manageable.

customer_reviews.title: Help for the recovery of acne
customer_reviews.text: This mask is very easy to use, helpful for the recovery of acne, can also clean the skin, the price is also reasonable, it is worth trying a mask!

customer_reviews.title: I do not think this is the real deal...
customer_reviews.text: The mask doesn't feel right, it has no elasticity and doesn't absorb the serum very well. I have used many different kinds of Korean sheet masks, including Dr. Jart's Hydro Solutions masks. This feels cheaper than anything I've ever used before. I don't know if Dr. Jart's quality has gone down hill but I suspect this is a cheap knock-off. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Fake product, exterior looks completely similar to the authentic ones i have from asian. but when you open it up the smell and feel of the mask is definitely off. Probably just rubbing alcohol...

customer_reviews.title: these masks are the greatest ones I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! these masks are the greatest ones I've ever used! I'm still re-stocking! I use my regular clay face mask once a week so I use these about once every two weeks and whenever I do, my skin feels so great!

customer_reviews.title: Im try the check the provides general information about product ...

customer_reviews.title: This mask is hyperpigmentations worst nightmare
customer_reviews.text: This is a holy grail sheet masks for those with uneven skin tone and/or acne prone skin. I suffer from hyperpigmentation and hormonal acne. This mask literally clears up my acne and lightens my acne scars after one use! I use the mask in the evening after cleansing and toning my skin and massage all of the left ofter serum on my face. Come morning, my face is clear and bright (obviously I still have acne scars, but they're noticeably lighter and have been improving with each use). This mask is now a staple in my skin care routine. And considering that the mask runs almost $9 a peice at Sephora, this is really a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Breonna

customer_reviews.title: Does the opposite of what it claimes to do.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this mask. The sheet is nice and soft and stays put on my face but i have tried this twice now and each time i try it i am left with one or two acne spots /: which is exactly what this mask is supposed to prevent. So i have to give it 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: MaraTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The holy grail of acne masks
customer_reviews.text: This product works so incredibly well on my skin that I cannot stop suggesting it to friends. I have very mixed skin, and this mask hydrates and gets rid of tons of red acne after only one use. It does tingle a bit when you put it on, but it is more than bearable. Buy this and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: bnkih

customer_reviews.title: Great item, amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Works well for acne. This multi pack is the same as the Sephora product but a fraction of the price. Box came squashed, but each mask is safely individually sealed and wrapped. Large mask and a lot of product which is great! Easy to apply and remove, does not rip or shred.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I had heard wonderful things about this product and they definitely lived up to the hype. Great mask and actually helped reduce the redness and appearance of my acne-prone skin.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this expecting to clear up some acne, it did NOTHING. You can get regular sheet masks for a fraction of the price that do the same thing, DID NOT clear up acne.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: After reading reviews that these masks could help with breakouts ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews that these masks could help with breakouts and calm irritated skin down, I was excited to try them. I put one one last night for 20 minutes, and after I tool it off my skin did look hydrated and less red. But now, the next day, I have about ten tiny pimples on my skin and it feels itchy and looks red & irritated. I haven't used any new products on my skin except for this one, so I know it's what broke my skin out.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: these do wonders for my skin. I haven't found ...
customer_reviews.text: these do wonders for my skin. I haven't found a skin mask that helps with blemishes as much as these do.

customer_reviews.text: I like to sit back while enjoying a face mask, but these are so drippy I had to keep wiping my neck. Would not recommend.

product_meta.title: Dr. Jart Dermask Micro Jet Clearing Solution Mask Sheet, 5 Count
product_meta.description: This silky, hydrating microfiber sheet mask. Made of soft microfiber finer than a strand of hair. Addresses trouble-prone complexions by soothing redness and inflamed skin from acne and preventing pigmentation. Featuring a super silky texture, the thin material of the mask gently clings to skin for even and consistent absorption of active ingredients. Glutathione, a potent antioxidant, visibly evens out skin tone and helps brighten and improve the appearance of dark spots and discoloration. A trio of essential ingredients including salicylic acid, tea tree oil, and niacin amide control excessive oil and breakouts for a clear, luminous skin.
feature_bullets: Addresses trouble-prone complexions by soothing redness and inflamed skin
Gently clings to skin for even and consistent absorption of active ingredients
Glutathione, a potent antioxidant, visibly evens out skin tone and helps brighten and improve the appearance of dark spots

specifications.Manufacturer: Mainspring America, Inc. DBA Direct Cosmetics
